allow: Bash(./venv/bin/pip install alpaca-trade-api alpaca-py aiohttp scipy pyyaml)
Bash(./venv/bin/pip install torch gym tqdm wandb matplotlib seaborn)
Bash(./venv/bin/python -c "import alpaca_trade_api; import torch; import gym; print('All imports successful!')")

Bash(# Move debug scripts
mv debug_*.py scripts/debug/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv diagnose_*.py scripts/debug/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv add_*debug*.py scripts/debug/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move analysis scripts  
mv analyze_*.py scripts/analysis/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv benchmark_*.py scripts/analysis/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv calculate_*.py scripts/analysis/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv compare_*.py scripts/analysis/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv monitor_*.py scripts/analysis/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv visualize_*.py scripts/analysis/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Move fix scripts (except the ones used by main training)
mv fix_*.py scripts/fixes/ 2>/dev/null || true
# Move back the essential fix scripts
mv scripts/fixes/fix_zero_trading.py . 2>/dev/null || true
mv scripts/fixes/fix_rewards_and_winrate.py . 2>/dev/null || true
mv scripts/fixes/fix_position_closing_paper_compliant.py . 2>/dev/null || true

# Move old training scripts
mv train_aggressive_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_and_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_final_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_gpu_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_hybrid_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_live_options.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_live_paper_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_lstm_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_optimized_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_options_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_profitable_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_profit_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_real_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_simple_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_winners_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_with_*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train_working*.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true
mv train.py scripts/old_training/ 2>/dev/null || true)
